metadata.title: Wissen Dan hockey club visits national assembly

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP): The players and officials of the German Hockey Club, Wissen Dan, participating in the Prime Minister's Youth International Hockey Series, visited the National Assembly of Pakistan on Monday. The Speaker of the National Assembly, Ayaz Sadiq, welcomed all the players, guests, and organizers. The visiting club declared their visit an honor to witness the proceedings of the parliament and extended gratitude to the organizers for arranging the tour.
